item.description:
Sorry for the very late notice, but I just thought that it would be fun to turn a family trip to the zoo tomorrow to an Arabic meetup event. Those interested in expanding their Arabic animal names vocabulary can come and learn them as we pass the exhibits.

The zoo is about 45 minutes from Metrowest and an hour and a half from Boston. Their website is here:

http://www.southwicks...

and admission fees are here:
http://www.southwicks...

If you are interested but can't make maybe we can arrange the event again for another date. We'll be there in any case so you are welcome to join in. If you RSVP yes I'll send a message with my cell phone number. Hope to see some of you there!

Salam,
Amr
item.name: Southwick's Zoo Interactive Animal Vocabulary Event
